UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Chaxapeptin, a Lasso Peptide from Extremotolerant Streptomyces leeuwenhoekii Strain C58 from the Hyperarid Atacama Desert.
Literature.Author: Elsayed SS, Trusch F, Deng H, Raab A, Prokes I, Busarakam K, Asenjo JA, Andrews BA, van West P, Bull AT, Goodfellow M, Yi Y, Ebel R, Jaspars M, Rateb ME

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=30-35µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis NCTC 2116(MIC=30-35µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(20-30% Inhibition=5µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(50-60% Inhibition=50µM)
